comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution (deduction version of ~ sbie ). (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 24-Jun-2018.)
